searchSpace.create_description: Create a new search space to organize your knowledge
searchSpace.description_placeholder: What is this search space for?
searchSpace.search_spaces_count: {count, plural, =0 {No search spaces} =1 {1 search space} other {# search spaces}}
searchSpace.create_first_search_space: Create your first search space to get started
searchSpace.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all data.
searchSpace.leave_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{name}"? You will lose access to all documents and chats in this search space.
searchSpace.welcome_description: Create your first search space to start organizing your knowledge, connecting sources, and chatting with AI.

userSettings.title: User Settings
userSettings.description: Manage your account settings and API access
userSettings.profile_nav_description: Manage your display name and avatar
userSettings.profile_display_name_hint: This is how your name appears across the app
userSettings.api_key_description: Use this key to authenticate API requests
userSettings.api_key_warning_description: Your API key grants full access to your account. Never share it publicly or commit it to version control.
userSettings.usage_description: Include your API key in the Authorization header:

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.failed_load_llm_config: Failed to load your LLM configuration
dashboard.delete_chat_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete
dashboard.delete_note_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete

dashboard.leave_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{name}"? You will lose access to all documents and chats in this search space.
dashboard.create_first_space: Create your first search space to get started

pricing.title: SurfSense Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose that works for you
pricing.feature_ollama: Supports local Ollama or vLLM setups
pricing.feature_podcasts: Podcasts support with local TTS providers.
pricing.feature_extension: Cross-Browser Extension for dynamic webpages including authenticated content
pricing.community_desc: Open source version with powerful features
pricing.enterprise_desc: For large organizations with specific needs

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We'd love to Hear From You.
contact.we_will_contact: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

connectors.title: Connectors
connectors.subtitle: Manage your connected services and data sources.
connectors.view_manage: View and manage all your connected services.
connectors.no_connectors_desc: You haven't added any connectors yet. Add one to enhance your search capabilities.
connectors.name: Name
connectors.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this connector? This action cannot be undone.
connectors.select_date_range_desc: Choose the start and end dates for indexing content. Leave empty to use default range.

documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Manage your documents and files.
documents.delete_partial_failed: Some documents could not be deleted
documents.confirm_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete {count} document(s)? This action cannot be undone.

add_connector.title: Connect Your Tools
add_connector.subtitle: Integrate with your favorite services to enhance your research capabilities.
add_connector.tavily_desc: Search the web using the Tavily API
add_connector.searxng_desc: Use your own SearxNG meta-search instance for web results.
add_connector.linkup_desc: Search the web using the Linkup API
add_connector.elasticsearch_desc: Connect to Elasticsearch to index and search documents, logs and metrics.
add_connector.baidu_desc: Search the Chinese web using Baidu AI Search API
add_connector.slack_desc: Connect to your Slack workspace to access messages and channels.
add_connector.teams_desc: Connect to Microsoft Teams to access your team's conversations.
add_connector.discord_desc: Connect to Discord servers to access messages and channels.
add_connector.linear_desc: Connect to Linear to search issues, comments and project data.
add_connector.jira_desc: Connect to Jira to search issues, tickets and project data.
add_connector.clickup_desc: Connect to ClickUp to search tasks, comments and project data.
add_connector.notion_desc: Connect to your Notion workspace to access pages and databases.
add_connector.github_desc: Connect a GitHub PAT to index code and docs from accessible repositories.
add_connector.confluence_desc: Connect to Confluence to search pages, comments and documentation.
add_connector.bookstack_desc: Connect to BookStack to search wiki pages and documentation.
add_connector.airtable_desc: Connect to Airtable to search records, tables and database content.
add_connector.luma_desc: Connect to Luma to search events, meetups and gatherings.
add_connector.circleback_desc: Receive meeting notes, transcripts and action items from Circleback via webhook.
add_connector.calendar_desc: Connect to Google Calendar to search events, meetings and schedules.
add_connector.gmail_desc: Connect to your Gmail account to search through your emails.
add_connector.google_drive_desc: Connect to Google Drive to search and index your files and documents.
add_connector.zoom_desc: Connect to Zoom to access meeting recordings and transcripts.
add_connector.webcrawler_desc: Crawl and index content from any public web pages.

upload_documents.title: Upload Documents
upload_documents.subtitle: Upload your files to make them searchable and accessible through AI-powered conversations.
upload_documents.file_size_limit: Maximum file size: 50MB per file. Supported formats vary based on your ETL service configuration.
upload_documents.file_types_desc: These file types are supported based on your current ETL service configuration.
upload_documents.max_files_exceeded_desc: You can upload a maximum of {max} files at a time.
upload_documents.file_limit_reached_desc: Remove some files to add more (max {max} files).

add_webpage.title: Add Webpages for Crawling
add_webpage.subtitle: Enter URLs to crawl and add to your document collection
add_webpage.label: Enter URLs to crawl
add_webpage.placeholder: Enter a URL and press Enter
add_webpage.hint: Add multiple URLs by pressing Enter after each one
add_webpage.tip_1: Enter complete URLs including http:// or https://
add_webpage.tip_2: Make sure the websites allow crawling
add_webpage.tip_4: Crawling may take some time depending on the website size
add_webpage.error_no_url: Please add at least one URL
add_webpage.success_toast_desc: URLs have been submitted for crawling
add_webpage.error_generic: An error occurred while crawling URLs
add_webpage.duplicate_url_toast_desc: This URL has already been added

add_youtube.title: Add YouTube Videos
add_youtube.subtitle: Enter YouTube video URLs to add to your document collection
add_youtube.label: Enter YouTube Video URLs
add_youtube.placeholder: Enter a YouTube URL and press Enter
add_youtube.hint: Add multiple YouTube URLs by pressing Enter after each one
add_youtube.tip_1: Use standard YouTube URLs (youtube.com/watch?v= or youtu.be/)
add_youtube.tip_2: Make sure videos are publicly accessible
add_youtube.tip_4: Processing may take some time depending on video length
add_youtube.error_no_video: Please add at least one YouTube video URL
add_youtube.success_toast_desc: YouTube videos have been submitted for processing
add_youtube.error_generic: An error occurred while processing YouTube videos
add_youtube.invalid_url_toast_desc: Please enter a valid YouTube video URL
add_youtube.duplicate_url_toast_desc: This YouTube video has already been added

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your LLM configurations and role assignments for this search space.
settings.llm_role_desc: Assign your LLM configurations to specific roles for different purposes.
settings.no_llm_configs_found: No LLM configurations found. Please add at least one LLM provider in the Model Configs tab before assigning roles.
settings.long_context_desc: Handles summarization of long documents and complex Q&A
settings.long_context_examples: Document analysis, research synthesis, complex Q&A
settings.fast_llm_desc: Optimized for quick responses and real-time interactions
settings.fast_llm_examples: Quick searches, simple questions, instant responses
settings.strategic_llm_desc: Advanced reasoning for planning and strategic decision making
settings.strategic_llm_examples: Planning workflows, strategic analysis, complex problem solving
settings.all_roles_assigned: All roles are assigned and ready to use! Your LLM configuration is complete.
settings.complete_role_assignments: Complete all role assignments to enable full functionality. Each role serves different purposes in your workflow.

logs.title: Task Logs
logs.subtitle: Monitor and analyze all task execution logs
logs.confirm_delete_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {count} selected log(s).
logs.confirm_delete_log_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the log entry.

onboard.welcome_subtitle: Let's configure your LLM configurations to get started
onboard.configure_providers_and_assign_roles: Add your LLM providers and assign them to specific roles
onboard.complete_role_assignment: Assign your LLM configurations to specific roles to continue
onboard.assign_specific_roles: Assign specific roles to your LLM configurations
onboard.all_set: You're all set to start using SurfSense!
onboard.add_provider_instruction: Add at least one LLM provider to continue. You can configure multiple providers and choose specific roles for each one in the next step.
onboard.add_provider_subtitle: Configure your first model provider to get started
onboard.configure_new_provider: Configure a new language model provider for your AI assistant
onboard.assign_roles_instruction: Assign your LLM configurations to specific roles. Each role serves different purposes in your workflow.
onboard.add_provider_before_roles: Please add at least one LLM provider in the previous step before assigning roles.
onboard.long_context_llm_desc: Handles summarization of long documents and complex Q&A
onboard.long_context_llm_examples: Document analysis, research synthesis, complex Q&A
onboard.fast_llm_desc: Optimized for quick responses and real-time interactions
onboard.fast_llm_examples: Quick searches, simple questions, instant responses
onboard.strategic_llm_desc: Advanced reasoning for planning and strategic decision making
onboard.strategic_llm_examples: Planning workflows, strategic analysis, complex problem solving

model_config.title: Model Configurations
model_config.subtitle: Manage your LLM provider configurations and API settings.
model_config.manage_configs: Manage and configure your LLM providers
model_config.no_configs_desc: Add your own LLM provider configurations.

sidebar.no_mentions_hint: You'll see mentions from others here
sidebar.no_status_updates_hint: Document and connector updates will appear here

searchSpaceSettings.title: Search Space Settings
searchSpaceSettings.general_name_description: A unique name for your search space.
searchSpaceSettings.general_description_description: A brief description of what this search space will be used for.
searchSpaceSettings.general_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes. Click "Save Changes" to apply them.

homepage.hero_description: Connect any LLM to your internal knowledge sources and chat with it in real time alongside your team.
homepage.integrations_subtitle: Integrate with your team's most important tools
homepage.features_subtitle: Powerful features designed to enhance collaboration, boost productivity, and streamline your workflow.
homepage.feature_workflow_desc: Centralize all your knowledge and resources in one intelligent workspace. Find what you need instantly and accelerate decision-making.
homepage.feature_collaboration_desc: Work together effortlessly with real-time collaboration tools that keep your entire team aligned.
homepage.feature_customizable_desc: Choose from 100+ leading LLMs and seamlessly call any model on demand.

find_ask_act.title: Find, Ask, Act
find_ask_act.description: Get instant information, detailed updates, and cited answers across company and personal knowledge.

real_time_collab.title: Work Together in Real Time
real_time_collab.description: Transform your company docs into multiplayer spaces with live edits, synced content, and presence.

beyond_text.title: Collaborate Beyond Text
beyond_text.description: Create podcasts and multimedia your team can comment on, share, and refine together.

context_counts.title: Context Where It Counts
context_counts.description: Add comments directly to your chats and docs for clear, in-the-moment feedback.

features.citation_illustration_title: Citation feature illustration showing clickable source reference
features.collab_illustration_label: Illustration of a realtime collaboration in a text editor.
features.annotation_illustration_label: Illustration of a text editor with annotation comments.

public_chat.sign_in_prompt: to log in to SurfSense and start your own.
